PyDatSource API¶

Data Source¶

DataSource([data_source, default_modules]) Python version of psana.DataSource with support for event and config data as well as PyDetector functions to access calibrated data.
SourceData(source) Source information for a daq device.
ScanData(ds[, quiet]) Scan configuration for Run
ConfigSources(configData) Configuration Sources
ConfigData(ds) Configuration Data representation of configStore within psana.DataSource.env object
EpicsConfig(configStore) Tab Accessible configStore Epics information.

Data Iterators¶

Runs(ds, **kwargs) psana DataSource Run iterator from ds.runs().
Steps(ds, **kwargs) Step iterator from ds.steps().
Run(ds, **kwargs) Python psana.Run class from psana.DataSource.runs().next().
RunEvents(ds, **kwargs) Event iterator from ds.runs() for indexed idx data
SmdEvents(ds, **kwargs) Event iterator for smd xtc data that iterates first over steps and then events in steps (to make sure configData is updated for each step since it is possible that it changes).
StepEvents(ds, **kwargs) Event iterator from ds.steps().events()
Events(ds, **kwargs) Event iterator

Detector Access¶

EvtDetectors(ds[, publish, init, update_stats]) Psana tab accessible event detectors.
Detector(ds, alias[, verbose]) Includes epicsData, configData, evrConfig info Uses full ds in order to be able to access epicsData info on an event basis.
AddOn(ds, alias) Collection of methods to add parameters, properties, and reduction/proccesing of data with roi, projection, histogram methods.

Event Info¶

EvrData(ds) Evr eventCode information for current event in DataSource
EvrDataDetails(ds) Evr eventCode information for current event in DataSource
EvrNullData(ds) Evr data class when no EvrData type is in event keys.
EventId(evt) Time stamp information from psana EventId.
L3Ttrue(ds) L3 Trigger default if no L3 Trigger data is in DataSource.
L3Tdata(ds) L3 Trigger data

psana.Detector Access¶

ImageData(det, evt) Tab accessibile dictified psana Detector object.
ImageCalibData(det, evt) Calibration Data from psana Detector object.
WaveformData(det, evt) Tab accessibile dictified psana.Detector object.
WaveformCalibData(det, evt) Waveform Calibration data using psana.Detector access.
IpimbData(det, evt) Tab accessibile dictified psana.Detector object.

Epics Data¶

EpicsData(ds) Epics data from psana epicsStore.
PvData(attr_dict, ds[, level]) Epics PV Data.
EpicsStorePV(epicsStore, pv) Epics PV access from epicsStore.
TimeStamp(stamp) Class to represent time stamp objects

Low-level Psana Data Interface¶

PsanaTypeList(type_list) Python representation for lists of psana data objects.
PsanaTypeData(typ_func[, nolist]) Python representation of a psana data object (event or configStore data).
PsanaSrcData(objclass, srcstr[, key_info, …]) Python represenation of psana data for a given detector source.

Data Structures¶

DataSource.to_hdf5([build_html]) Write directly to hdf5 in xarray comatable netcdf4 format.
to_summary(x[, dim, groupby, save_summary, …]) Summarize a run.
to_h5netcdf([xdat, ds, file_name, path, …]) Write hdf5 file with netcdf4 convention using builtin xarray engine h5netcdf.
open_h5netcdf([file_name, path, file_base, …]) Open hdf5 file with netcdf4 convention using builtin xarray engine h5netcdf.

DataSource Configuration¶

DataSource.xarray_kwargs Dictionary of keywords passed to to_xarray.
DataSource.save_config([file_name, path]) Save DataSource configuration.
DataSource.load_config([run, exp, user, …]) Load DataSource configuration.
